Reviews.Title: Pentax Optio 15921 14 MP Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Dennis Chiu
Reviews.Content: Great little camera. perfect if you want a cheap point and shoot camera. when you zoom the quality is not lost and takes good quality video. highly recommended

Reviews.Title: great camera short battery
Reviews.Author: jason
Reviews.Content: this is a great camera with lots of options.  the screen has good color, and is very clear and easy to see however the battery life seems short.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: D. Majetic
Reviews.Content: Great small camera for the price.  Easy to use and carry. Takes quality pictures and good video.  All around good as a primary or secondary camera.

Reviews.Title: Amazing quality
Reviews.Author: booknugget
Reviews.Content: My last digital camera was a Pentax and I loved that as well.  After looking at reviews and trying out others, including ones that photographers swore was the only camera for them, I decided to buy a Nikon.  I get the $250 Nikon home, and the quality isn't there.I return it, and go back to Pentax.  This camera is amazing.  It's so small I forget it's in my pocket. It takes incredible pictures.  I took it to France for 10 days and now have friends, coworkers, family members all asking where I got "that painting" (they're always photos that I took).One bad note - the battery contacts broke and I had to send the camera in for repairs.  It was within warranty and fixed promptly. The situation was handled well, I just wish it wouldn't have been an issue to begin with.

Reviews.Title: Pentax Optio 15921 Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Andrea Kubinski
Reviews.Content: I really like this camera.  It has a lot of settings, it is small and sleek.  The snap of the photo isn't bad.  I still need to read the owners manual to learn more about all the features.  The only thing I notice is that the flash is so bright that it almost whites out what you are taking the picture of.  I have played with some of the basic settings and taking a photo in "green mode" does seem to help a bit.  Like I said, I do need to read the owners manual and I can perhaps turn down the brightness of it (just haven't figured it out) - even on a soft flash it does it.

Reviews.Title: pentax optio 15921 digital camera
Reviews.Author: 2seta
Reviews.Content: Great little camera.  It was very inexpensive, takes great pics and simple to use.  It is perfect for what I needed.  Better than most basic small digitals.

Reviews.Title: Quick Pic
Reviews.Author: Nancy R. Hall
Reviews.Content: This was a gift to our daughter and she is very pleased with its operation.She finds it easy to operate adn light to carry.

Reviews.Title: Love My Camera! Even has a self timer
Reviews.Author: Paula fitz
Reviews.Content: I bought the Pentax Optio S1 after reading many reviews on different cameras here. Originally, I purchased a Panasonic Lumix and was disappointed with it so returned it and got this one in an aqua color. I love it! Many years ago I had a similar camera made by Pentax under a generic name (Norcent) and the Pentax Optio S1 had all the features the Norcent had, so I was very familiar with how to work it from day one.There are a lot of settings and a lot of choices for scene selection to help you capture photos perfectly in different situations- even a pet setting that has features for white animals and black animals (either of which can be hard to get good quality pics of without over/under exposure).  The "kid" and "sports" settings are great for anything fast moving to avoid blurs. Sunset works well for lower light, as does the Nighttime setting. Too many to list here, but well worth a bit of your time playing with them to find out what works best in your situation. The self timer has a 2 and 10 second timer you can choose from- its great for setting up a family photo with several folks, and then jumping in at the last few seconds to include yourself.There are many options for brightness, pixels, AE metering, sensitivity, EV compensation, d range, shake reduction, instant review, sharpness, saturation, contrast and even date imprint. Set up in several languages is simple, and explained in the included manual. You can even change the sounds the camera makes and control an automatic shut off timer to preserve battery life.You can even work it in a manual setting if you so desire.Playback of pictures is by one push of a button. Many flash options, or no flash at all. Macro, super macro, pan focus, infinity and manual focus options.The video will record for a long while- I have several 4 and 6 minute videos recorded- it helps to have at least a 4gb card, of which I recommend the Kingston brand here on amazon. Also available are generic rechargeable batteries on AMazon, at a fraction of the cost of the name brand ones- work the same, been buying them for years!This camera comes with the hand strap, a USB cord, battery charger, manual and more.  The battery charger is the type which plugs into the camera itself, and then into the outlet...not a separate charger station like you may be used to.  It charges up rather fast- just under 3 hrs... so it is useful to have a spare, charged battery or two available (and for that matter, a few SD cards too) .A nice feature is the ability to hook the cam to the TV to view as a slide show all the pics on a grand scale!The pictures are not grainy, very crisp. Play with the settings and try taking close ups of flowers in super macro mode-- magnificent.  You'll love the camera... it is worth paying for verses the higher rated cameras...it holds its own. Pentax did well with this one!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, nice features and beautiful pictures
Reviews.Author: Bob101
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera as I have had good results with other cmaeras made by this manufacturer. This camera is easy to hold in your hand, has lots of features and the pictures turn out beautifully. The price was great, the amount of time to receive my order was great and I am very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Not what i spected from Pentax
Reviews.Author: Ig
Reviews.Content: Photos come up ugly too dark or to white. For digital cameras go for others brands. Or for a better pentax at  higher cost

Reviews.Title: Bad pictures.
Reviews.Author: Teresa N. "Madre Teresa"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because it looks great on the pic they have here at amazon, and the reviews weren't all bad. As soon as I started playing with the camera it froze. The pictures I had taken are not of good resolution and the video just allows me to take it for 15 seconds. I wouldn't recomend this camera at all.

Reviews.Title: Dissapointed
Reviews.Author: S. Buetens
Reviews.Content: I wanted to buy a penatax because my friend had an SLR Pentax and I was quite inpressed with it, I wanted a point and shoot though but thought I would give the brand a try. I'm pretty dissapointed though. My last three cameras ere Casio's and they didn't last very long but at least worked really well right when I got them! This one crashed the first time we tried to take a video (and missed out on a great video super super unfortunate). The picture quality is also just not great and the menus options are not as easy as those on my old cameras.

Reviews.Title: Pentax Optio S1
Reviews.Author: H. J. Collins
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with the camera.  It is very compact and easy to use.  It takes great pictures.

ProductInfo.Features:
14-megapixel sensor; wide-angle 5x optical zoom lens (28-140mm)
Sensor-shift Pentax Shake Reduction (SR) system; Movie SR keeps motion video steady
Capture widescreen 720p HD video
Elegant design with an ultra-compact footprint
Capture images/video to SD/SDHC memory cards (not included)
And a highly polished, reflective surface in chrome, black, or green.
Capture widescreen 720p HD video when a still image just isn?t enough to record the essence of the scene.
Elegant design with an ultra-compact footprint, featuring soft curves, rounded edges.
High resolution 14 megapixel sensor ensures exceptional detail in large print sizes, and provides flexibility when cropping an image.
Sensor-shift PENTAX Shake Reduction (SR) system helps keep images tack sharp, even in dim lighting, while Movie SR keeps motion video steady.
Wide angle 5X optical zoom lens (28-140mm) offers great framing flexibility for subjects near or far.
ProductInfo.Name: Pentax Optio 15921 14 MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom (Black)
